description: These rabbit kaomojis use U characters to make big floppy bunny ears. You can take almost any kaomoji and add capital letter U’s to the side of the head to make it look rabbit-ey. The floppy ears make these rabbits look lazy, floppy, and relaxed. ꓃ makes a great mouth with these ears. title: Big Floppy Ears
